pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DBIS Exercise Manager[![pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/dbis-exc-manager)](https://pypi.org/project/dbis-exc-manager/)[![PyPI Status](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dbis-exc-manager)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/dbis-exc-manager/)[![Github Actions Build](https://github.com/rwth-acis/dbis-exercise-manager/workflows/Build/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/rwth-acis/dbis-exercise-manager/actions?query=workflow%3ABuild+branch%3Amain)[![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/rwth-acis/dbis-exercise-manager.svg)](https://github.com/rwth-acis/dbis-exercise-manager/issues)[![GitHub closed issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-closed/rwth-acis/dbis-exercise-manager.svg)](https://github.com/rwth-acis/dbis-exercise-manager/issues/?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed)This class manages the state of the exercises.Example for arguments:ÃœB 1, Aufgabe 2.3 a), 2 Punkte * exc = 1* task = 2* subtask = 3a)* points = 2Example usage:``` pythonexc = Exercise( 1 )task1 = Task( exc, task = 1, subtask = "2 a)", points = 2 )```
